author: marios
msg: When you create a bucket in the default region 'us-east-1', specifying the
bucket location as 'us-east-1' causes S3 to return an error. Check if location
is 'us-east-1' and if so remove this param before calling to S3.

author: kkolinko
msg: Simplify code. Move toString() call out of urlDecode() method.

author: julianfoad
msg: On the 'showing-merge-info' branch: Introduce a 'pegged location' data type

author: simonetripodi
msg: added the pipeline descriptor File option - it works like ant or maven, by default it looks for `c3p.xml` file
